item.title: Seeking Video Editor for Short Form Fitness Sizzle Reel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor that can create a hype fitness short form sizzle reel for social media. I am seeking an editor that can edit on beat with high energy music

examples of what I am looking for
https://www.instagram.com/p/Cp6aHB4ummQ/
https://www.instagram.com/p/CoyaMr0DsfG/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C7E4bzcCbQ8/

If you are interested in this job please send samples similar to the examples above. Showing that you can edit to the music, have dynamic transitions, sound fx, and eye catching edits.

If I like your work on this project this can lead to a long term position.

Budget: $40

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We run a YouTube channel about making money through side hustles and we’re looking for someone who can edit videos for our channel.

We would provide you with the video script and a voice over along with scenes and you would edit the video. You can change the scenes as you see fit.

The length of the video will be around 10 minutes.

Also, if you’ve ever edited any YouTube videos, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!


Budget: $50
Posted On: July 02, 2024 01:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education

item.title: Movie Recap - Upwork
item.description:
Note: Movie Recap

We are looking for a talented and experienced video editor to join our team and help create engaging content for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere and After Effects, and a creative eye for storytelling.
Responsibilities:
Edit video footage and audio to create engaging content for our YouTube channel
Work closely with our creative team to develop and implement video concepts
Ensure all videos meet our brand guidelines and are of the highest quality
Ensure all videos meet YouTube’s policies
Collaborate with other members of the team to ensure timely delivery of videos
Stay up to date with the latest trends and techniques in video editing
Requirements:
2+ years of experience in video editing
Strong skills in Adobe Premiere and After Effects
Experience working with a variety of video formats and codecs
Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
This is a full-time position, with the possibility of remote work. If you are passionate about video editing and want to be a part of a dynamic team, please apply with your resume, samples and a portfolio of your work.



Budget: $20
Posted On: July 02, 2024 01:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Music Video, Movie, Audio Editing, Photo Slideshow, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Music Video, Movie, Audio Editing, Photo Slideshow, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: CAN
click to apply

item.title: I need someone to edit Motivational Video Essays With Anime Clips - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I am looking to make anime motivational videos about transforming your life. I will provide the script and my voice recording for you to edit anime clips and subtitles over to make a video documentary about changing your life. I am willing to pay $10 - $15 per video depending on how good the videos are, And if the videos perform well then I will up the pay from there.

I am looking for someone that can recreate this editing style
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cRvycegTOR0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bQtKSGlviWI

I'm looking for someone that knows enough about anime to find and use anime clips in the background and edit eye catching subtitles to emphasize certain words. I give you full creative freedom with the editing and you should require minimal direction from me.
If this job looks right for you submit your portfolio link in the application and I will check your quality of work. Obviously with this budget I don't fully expect the quality of the example videos to be replicated so don't feel scared that your not good enough

Budget: $10
Posted On: July 02, 2024 01:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Tiktok ucg creator long term - Upwork
item.description:
I am a Tiktok shop affiliate user and i often receive samples of products. I will need someone that is really outgoing and fun mostly and able to create videos for brands. It will be many different products of many different brands. videos around 45 seconds just showing the product and talk about the benefits mostly.

I would send the product to you and you can do the videos and most of the times you can keep the product if you want, but sometimes you would need to ship it back to me.

it will be a long term project because i receive usually at least 10 products per month, and it can be much more than that depending of the month.


Posted On: July 02, 2024 01:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, TikTok, UGC
Skills: Social Media Video, TikTok, UGC
Country: USA
click to apply
